subject: Changed location of a macro - MIN_DELIVERY_DIFF_FACTOR
commitMessage:
Changed location of a macro - MIN_DELIVERY_DIFF_FACTOR

-The macro MIN_DELIVERY_DIFF_FACTOR is being used in 5 files.
-Instead of defining it separately in 5 different files, 5 times, this can be defined in a common header file.
-It would make it easier to make any changes to the macro.
-So, this macro has been shifted to common.h

Change-Id: I0897e52b68767e6c7a9ca1c0fddd7f174d88f6c7

comments.message:

lets discuss with me next week. it makes that plugins(HAL) and common library has a dependency...

subject: Adding event driven test framework for geomagnetic sensor
commitMessage:
Adding event driven test framework for geomagnetic sensor

comments.message:
Patch Set 2:

please, could you reply how this test maintains? if sensor is added every time, you have to add test file which is almost same with another test code... let's talk about it. and i think it would be better to change it to automatic test, ie using gtest or something tools. and it cannot cover so any other use-case. please consider it again.
